member.name: IDCompositionVisual.AddVisual
member.summary: Adds a new child visual to the children list of this visual.
member.param: The child visual to add. This parameter must not be NULL.
TRUE to place the new child visual in front of the visual specified by the referenceVisual parameter, or FALSE to place it behind referenceVisual.
The existing child visual next to which the new visual should be added.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.RemoveAllVisuals
member.summary: Removes all visuals from the children list of this visual.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.RemoveVisual
member.summary: Removes a child visual from the children list of this visual.
member.param: The child visual to remove from the children list. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetBitmapInterpolationMode
member.summary: Sets the BitmapInterpolationMode property, which specifies the mode for Microsoft DirectComposition to use when interpolating pixels from bitmaps that are not axis-aligned or drawn exactly at scale.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetBorderMode
member.summary: Sets the BorderMode property, which specifies how to compose the edges of bitmaps and clips associated with this visual, or with visuals in the subtree rooted at this visual.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetClip
member.summary: Sets the Clip property of this visual to the specified rectangle. The Clip property restricts the rendering of the visual subtree that is rooted at this visual to the specified rectangular region.
member.param: The rectangle to use to clip this visual. All properties of the rect parameter have a numerical limit of -2^21 to 2^21. The API accepts numbers outside of this range, but they are always clamped to this range.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetClip
member.summary: Sets the Clip property of this visual to the specified clip object. The Clip property restricts the rendering of the visual subtree that is rooted at this visual to a rectangular region.
member.param: The clip object to associate with this visual. This parameter can be NULL. All float properties of IDCompositionRectangleClip have a numerical limit of -2^21 to 2^21. The API accepts numbers outside of this range, but they are always clamped to this range.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetCompositeMode
member.summary: Sets the blending mode for this visual.
member.param: The blending mode to use when composing the visual to the screen.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetContent
member.summary: Sets the Content property of this visual to the specified bitmap or window wrapper.
member.param: The object that is the new content of this visual. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetEffect
member.summary: Sets the Effect property of this visual. The Effect property modifies how the subtree that is rooted at this visual is blended with the background, and can apply a 3D perspective transform to the visual.
member.param: A pointer to an effect object. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetOffsetX
member.summary: Changes the value of the OffsetX property of this visual. The OffsetX property specifies the new offset of the visual along the x-axis, relative to the parent visual.
member.param: The new offset of the visual along the x-axis, in pixels.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetOffsetX
member.summary: Changes the value of the OffsetX property of this visual. The OffsetX property specifies the new offset of the visual along the x-axis, relative to the parent visual.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the OffsetX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetOffsetY
member.summary: Changes the value of the OffsetY property of this visual. The OffsetY property specifies the new offset of the visual along the y-axis, relative to the parent visual.
member.param: The new offset of the visual along the y-axis, in pixels.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetOffsetY
member.summary: Animates the value of the OffsetY property of this visual. The OffsetY property specifies the new offset of the visual along the y-axis, relative to the parent visual.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the OffsetY property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetTransform
member.summary: Sets the Transform property of this visual to the specified 3-by-2 transform matrix.
member.param: The 3-by-2 transform matrix that is used to modify the coordinate system of this visual.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetTransform
member.summary: Sets the Transform property of this visual to the specified 2D transform object.
member.param: The transform object that is used to modify the coordinate system of this visual. This parameter can point to an interface or one of its derived interfaces. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual.SetTransformParent
member.summary: Sets the TransformParent property of this visual. The TransformParent property establishes the coordinate system relative to which this visual is composed.
member.param: The new visual that establishes the base coordinate system for this visual. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.
